section.title: Element: Line
section.simpara: The Line element encapsulates sets of tokens on a line, together with the comment on the line if available.

formalpara.title: Line Contents
formalpara.para:
Lines consist of any of the following in any order in any amount:
Token Primitive Number String Variable .

formalpara.title: Line Attributes
formalpara.para: The comment is used to store the comment string that appears on a line or is empty otherwise.
